Articles.Content: I've had an epiphany recently which involves the use of the contract system. Why not have different companies pay you funds to get their satellites into orbit? In my eyes, it makes a ton of sense. And, quite honestly, I'm not sure why Squad hasn't come up with this already. Peace
This has been suggested loads, Though i still agree and it would actually make me play career
So long as I can delete the payloads once the contract is over.

This, asteroid retrieval missions, and station building missions should really be added into stock, but for the mean while we'll have to use the Fine Print mod to get them. With putting stations and satellites into orbit for a company, I think it should get turned over to their control, becoming an NPC station/satellite; there should then be an option in the settings menu to enable the game to auto delete NPC craft, as some (regex) won't want the clutter of these extra crafts in orbit.
